=== Other Examples ===

I hold a degree in SW Engineering (U. Corunna, Spain) and a MSc. in Human-Centred Interactive Technologies (U. of York, UK). A good part of my publicly available design work has been in the GNOME community. I also took part on the workshop on <nowiki>[[http://design.canonical.com/chi-2012|"Defamiliarisation in Innovation and Usability"]]</nowiki> at CHI 2012, organised by Canonical designers.

I am part of Igalia.
